directions.text: Look at each picture. Then read each sentence. Drag sentences that tell more detail about the picture into the blue box. Drag sentences that do not provide more detail into the red box.

help.text:
Sorting Defined Help

Answering Questions
  1. Read the directions at the start of the activity.
  2. Then, read each question and answer choice.
  3. Use the speaker button to listen to the recorded audio when available.
  4. Click or tap your answer, and don't let go! Then, drag it to the response line.
  5. As an alternative to the mouse, the keyboard may be used. Tab to your answer, press Space to select it, and press Enter to place it on the response line.
  6. Use the Check button to find out if your answer is correct.
  7. If the answer is incorrect, use the Try Again button, then choose a new answer.
  8. Use the Previous and Next buttons to navigate between question screens. You may review previous answers.
Top Buttons
  1. Use the button with the question mark to come back to this help page.
  2. Use the button with the X to close the activity.
  3. Use the button with the speaker to mute automatic audio feedback.
